column4: Apologies if this is a dumb question, but where is eth0?  I mean, the virtual file?  ifconfig says I have one, but I can't find it in /dev
what exactly are you trying to do?
Find out where /dev/eth0 went.  It used to be in /dev/net I think.
I have no idea to be honest - don't see anything on my 12.04, but I also don't see why you'd need it.
